医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Discngine 将在 SLAS 2024 上发布其检测目录 - 药物发现高级数据注释的新一步在即将举行的 SLAS 2024 活动期间，制药行业软件解决方案提供商 Discngine 将宣布推出其检测目录。 Discngine Assay 套件的这一新增功能也可作为独立模块提供，旨在集成到任何研究 IT 生态系统中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Discngine-to-release-its-Assay-Catalog-at-SLAS-2024-A-New-Step-in-Advanced-Data-Annotation-for-药物发现.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Discngine-to-release-its-Assay-Catalog-at-SLAS-2024-A-New-Step-in-Advanced-Data-Annotation-for-药物发现.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b0635b3-64e3-4fa2-a306-af4fc2256912 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 09:02:00 -0500
Festo 在 SLAS 2024 上展示其新型灵活移液解决方案在灵活性的实践演示中，同一支移液器可以分配 20 微升到 20 毫升的液体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Festo-Showcases-Its-New-Flexible-Pipetting-Solution-at-SLAS-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Festo-Showcases-Its-New-Flexible-Pipetting-Solution-at-SLAS-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32d7540d-e642-4b1c-9a2e-c6bc0743f08c Mon, 05 Feb 2024 09:01:00 -0500
研究发现，超过 80% 的索马鲁肽使用者在 12 个月后体重显着减轻https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Over-8025-of-semaglutide-users-achieve-significant-weight-loss-after-12-months-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Over-8025-of-semaglutide-users-achieve-significant-weight-loss-after-12-months-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a190dc01-adc4-4ab5-94c4-ce24273eb42c Mon, 05 Feb 2024 08:59:00 -0500 Over 80% of semaglutide users achieve significant weight loss after 12 months, study finds
Veranex 的 SLAS 2024 新闻稿Veranex 是首个专门为医疗技术行业打造的全球服务平台提供商，今天宣布其已收购 T3 Labs，这是一家位于佐治亚州亚特兰大、享有盛誉的临床前实验室。此次收购巩固了 Veranex 扩大其在北方的临床前足迹的承诺https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/SLAS-2024-press-release-from-Veranex.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/SLAS-2024-press-release-from-Veranex.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0463f24c-8c75-4aaf-a1be-f70c552c8e25 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 08:57:00 -0500 SLAS 2024 press release from Veranex
横河电机推出CellVoyager高内涵分析系统CQ3000横河电机公司（东京股票代码：6841）今天宣布推出CQ3000，这是一种高内涵分析系统，用于捕获活细胞培养物的高清3D显微图像。 CQ3000 扩展了该公司的 CellVoyager™ 产品系列，将于 2024 年晚些时候投入商业使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Yokokawa-introduces-CellVoyager-High-Content-Analysis-System-CQ3000.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Yokokawa-introduces-CellVoyager-High-Content-Analysis-System-CQ3000.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=979615d8-3bb4-4289-9f02-b04fabdda264 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 08:55:00 -0500 Yokogawa introduces CellVoyager High-Content Analysis System CQ3000
bit.bio将在SLAS 2024国际会议暨展览会上展示ioCRISPR-Ready CellsTM产品bit.bio 是一家为新型疗法编码人类细胞的公司，将在实验室自动化与筛查协会 (SLAS) 会议上展示其新的 ioCRISPR-Ready 细胞组合的最新数据和重要应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/bitbio-to-showcase-its-ioCRISPR-Ready-CellsTM-products-at-the-SLAS-2024-international-conference-and-exhibition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/bitbio-to-showcase-its-ioCRISPR-Ready-CellsTM-products-at-the-SLAS-2024-international-conference-and-exhibition.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e18635ee-3f52-4b98-b260-ecae5c8a1f72 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 08:52:00 -0500 bit.bio to showcase its ioCRISPR-Ready CellsTM products at the SLAS 2024 international conference and exhibition
软件公司如何将自动化与先进的人工智能结合起来，作为整个实验室操作的单一平台，加速科学发现Xavo 使用先进的人工智能进行实验室自动化和调度，通过其独有的 Pathfinder 技术为样品管理、材料、设备接口和工作流程管理提供独特的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/How-a-software-company-is-combining-automation-with-advanced-AI-as-a-single-platform-for-the-entire-实验室操作加速科学发现.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/How-a-software-company-is-combining-automation-with-advanced-AI-as-a-single-platform-for-the-entire-实验室操作加速科学发现.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cddbb7e6-2764-447f-b318-a532a461b121 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 08:49:00 -0500 How a software company is combining automation with advanced AI as a single platform for the entire laboratory operations, accelerating scientific discovery
研究将特定炎症标志物与癌症风险增加联系起来循环炎症标志物与癌症风险的因果关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Study-links-specific-炎症-标记物-to-increased-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Study-links-specific-炎症-标记物-to-increased-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5418d5e-6272-4987-b18a-f096c40281e5 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 08:28:00 -0500 Study links specific inflammatory markers to increased cancer risk
利用精准肿瘤学的力量缩小癌症护理差距根据美国癌症协会的数据，全球每 6 人死亡中就有 1 人死于癌症，比艾滋病、肺结核和疟疾的总和还多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Closing-the-Cancer-Care-Gap-with-the-Power-of-Precision-Oncology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Closing-the-Cancer-Care-Gap-with-the-Power-of-Precision-Oncology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2dcbf50-e12a-4933-a483-9562f672a5ef Mon, 05 Feb 2024 07:36:00 -0500 Closing the Cancer Care Gap with the Power of Precision Oncology
Revvity 在 SLAS2024 上展示尖端解决方案Revvity 持续致力于通过科学拓展人类潜力的界限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Revity-showcases-cutting-edge-solutions-at-SLAS2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Revity-showcases-cutting-edge-solutions-at-SLAS2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c13fae49-e083-4ad5-aa00-06cd138b6c75 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 07:33:00 -0500 Revvity showcases cutting-edge solutions at SLAS2024
